channel.title: ChatBox (Client&Server)
channel.description:
So.. I'm working on a Chatbox.. What do you people think about it so far? Pics: [img]http://i47.photobucket.com/albums/f168/nevercme/Server-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i47.photobucket.com/albums/f168/nevercme/rest.jpg[/img]
-Register works (When you registered, you'll receive an email) -Login works -Recover password works (Enter your Username, wait 3 seconds, read the email) -Chatting works

item.title: ChatBox (Client&Server)
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:8, topic:361547”][quote author=abraham2119 link=topic=457819.msg3352490#msg3352490 date=1285467525]

[quote author=Lin link=topic=457819.msg3352465#msg3352465 date=1285465095]

[quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=457819.msg3352396#msg3352396 date=1285460298]
You should post the code, just to see how fast abraham comes and rapes your face in for doing things differently than him.
[/quote]Well, he obviously has nothing better to do, so that’s most likely what will happen.

On topic: Honestly, it’s the GUI is very ugly. You should have one main window with a full control box, menu bar, and toolbar to give it a complete look. Also, if you’re gonna create messages like that, atleast do something to separate the name and message, and use a fixed-length font.
[/quote]how hypocritical of you to be saying that when youre running around getting buttfucked for your bff davidi2
[/quote]Ahaha, right. Excuse me for sticking up for somebody getting trolled by an imbecile like you. Just admit it; you didn’t have anything to say because you knew JIMB and I were right, so you used the fact that I was trying to help Davidi in your attempt to flame me. Nice fail, bro.[/quote]what the fuck are you on about…you sound more incoherent than the rest of the little dickwads hanging around moparscape

i would say you have assimilated, but then again, you never were one of the smart ones

Read full topic
